name: 'Waking Ned Devine' Quiz | Waking Ned Devine | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the character who won the lottery?
questions.explanation:
Ned Devine.

	Just starting out with an easy one.

questions.text: How did the above character die?
questions.correct: Of shock at winning the lottery
options: He choked on a piece of chicken
questions.explanation:
Of shock at winning the lottery.

	That was an easy one too.

questions.text: Who holds the party to find out who won the lottery?
questions.explanation:
Jackie O'Shea.

	Ned Devine was the only one who did not show up.

questions.text: Complete this line: 'I've been using some fruity _____!'...
questions.explanation:
Soaps & Soap.

	Pig Finn to Maggie, who complains that he always smells like pigs.

questions.text: What is Jackie watching on television at the beginning of the movie?
questions.explanation:
The lottery.

	'Have we won??' 'No, but I got you to bring me the tart!'

questions.text: In what tiny village does this film take place?
What is the population of this village?
questions.explanation:
53 people.

	And there is only one child!!

questions.text: How will the villagers know the lottery man when they meet him?
questions.explanation:
He sneezes a lot.

	He has allergies.

questions.text: Who rides naked on the motorcyle?
questions.explanation:
Michael O'Sullivan.

	The race to Ned's house has to be the funniest scene in the movie. When Jackie rides the motorcycle, he is wearing shorts.

questions.text: How much money is the lottery prize?
questions.explanation:
6.9 million pounds

	To be completely exact, 6,894,620 pounds. I hope you enjoyed this quiz.
